== Synchronization ==

First, you have to sinchronize with facebook:

[http://lh4.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiUbp80bAcI/AAAAAAAAAIg/hHaHiJfL0uo/clip39_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

Press button "Authorize":

[http://lh3.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiUbjxiqMEI/AAAAAAAAAGM/CVvnKp0a_-0/clip02_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

Or, "start synch", if you aready have been logged in: 

[http://lh4.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiUbkKreekI/AAAAAAAAAGQ/rckKsGc1MNg/clip03_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

To authirize, put your e-mail:

[http://lh3.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiUbkraTcyI/AAAAAAAAAGc/9wRGA160l-0/clip06_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

[http://lh5.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiUbklMVfPI/AAAAAAAAAGg/QT2FvA-mHHo/clip07_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

And password:

[http://lh5.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiUbk35QZAI/AAAAAAAAAGk/TVhatDFykT8/clip08_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

You can shoose option "remember me":

[http://lh4.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiUbkyy_c8I/AAAAAAAAAGo/LdYw8gD4x2o/clip09_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

And in next time you'll see such picture:

[http://lh3.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiBvzpvYY2I/AAAAAAAAADM/5oWiWG_ScWI/screen__08_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

Then, just press button "Login":

[http://lh6.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiUblYo3nqI/AAAAAAAAAGw/_0ZWi-QCQAk/clip11_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

And shoose, when you want to application to remember your data
later:

[http://lh6.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiUbldXP0VI/AAAAAAAAAG0/i0K3UWIO81w/clip12_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

now:

[http://lh3.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiUblp2zx6I/AAAAAAAAAG4/Vhg9HbcvVzM/clip13_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

or never:

[http://lh6.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiUblwllhLI/AAAAAAAAAG8/49-pBigftmU/clip14_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

To generate you autorization taken, shoose "Создать" or "Create":

[http://lh3.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiUblyjSchI/AAAAAAAAAHA/qCa5eM-Sucs/clip15_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

Then you'll see your personal token, you can use it only once:

[http://lh3.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiUbl6wy7XI/AAAAAAAAAHE/g6FF7VeCNOE/clip16_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

Put it in window, which soon appears :

[http://lh5.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiUbmEDzzCI/AAAAAAAAAHI/zsYZKA6jENE/clip17_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

Press "Ok":

[http://lh6.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiUbmb6j8BI/AAAAAAAAAHM/CTpVybiOQfc/clip18_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

And you're logged in!

[http://lh5.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiUbmT0GNCI/AAAAAAAAAHQ/St46aET9AsE/clip19_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

Now you can start sinhc:

[http://lh3.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiUbmogTXJI/AAAAAAAAAHU/w-JXsy-e31g/clip20_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

Waite a second, please:

[http://lh4.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiUbmnR48hI/AAAAAAAAAHY/a6JdVs-Ux7A/clip21_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

And:

[http://lh3.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiUbmxW2cGI/AAAAAAAAAHc/6UnrJJP5LZs/clip22_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

Now you can view contacts:

[http://lh6.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiUbnmGuHXI/AAAAAAAAAHk/_TBrOyiMOHA/clip24_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]


Also, you can delete your cotacts:

[http://lh5.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiUbqBn3rpI/AAAAAAAAAIo/IRGa8QFLoEg/clip41_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

Then, you'll see such picture:

[http://lh5.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiUbqOfXsjI/AAAAAAAAAIs/_w2zif6-XeA/clip42_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

Press "ok":

[http://lh4.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiUbqTRdLUI/AAAAAAAAAIw/FuCTzuISUaI/clip43_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]


[http://lh5.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiUbqYgGb7I/AAAAAAAAAI0/LCYh-FB13ts/clip44_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

[http://lh4.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiUbqfSNohI/AAAAAAAAAI4/6W0RYgJoewM/clip45_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

[http://lh3.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiUbqk1bTVI/AAAAAAAAAI8/rlomchnmfbg/clip46_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

== Contacts ==

So, you shoose "view contacts":

[http://lh5.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiUbjrh1OmI/AAAAAAAAAGE/gNqeXXQn8CQ/clip00_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

If you have no authorization yet, you''ll see such picture. Please, sinchronize at first. How to do it, you can see in previous part of our instruction:

[http://lh6.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiUbjiVqFVI/AAAAAAAAAGI/j-GvAolWIfI/clip01_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

[http://lh5.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiUbnpP9lCI/AAAAAAAAAHo/4YInlS8jc74/clip25_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

Choose contact, which you need:

[http://lh3.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiUbn9MmgfI/AAAAAAAAAHs/NFEpA9lW3tY/clip26_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

[http://lh6.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiUbnxnly-I/AAAAAAAAAHw/YE_Nuf4F8zc/clip27_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]
